website_summaries.verdict: For use as a food topper or by themselves, these all-natural treats contain no artificial colors or preservatives.
pros: Ingredients include all-natural beef and beef organs, as well as non-GMO vegetables and fruits
Contains no artificial colors or preservatives, nor any grains
Use as a treat or a food-topper
Also available in a wide variety of other sizes and blends
cons: Some dogs experienced diarrhea after eating these
Treats are on the small side
good for training, but not the best choice as a regular treat for large dogs

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect size to fill up all treat dispensing toys and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these as training treats for both my puppy and my kitten. We don't use them as intended to top their meals because they are both raw fed. These are the perfect size to fill up all treat dispensing toys and carry for walks and training exercises. I personally wouldn't pay more than $7.99/bag for the 6oz bag. I've seen it go as low as $4.99 but it's been a while since the price dropped that low. It's worth scouting and keeping an eye on it since sometimes the price shoots way up! Found my review helpful? Please leave a vote!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY HERE!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs love this RAW topper on their premium dry kibble. But when it arrived, the cubes were hard as a rock. I actually had to hit them with a mallet to break them up. I tossed the rest of the bag, and bought new as soon as the roads were passable. I always get them at PetSmart, but ordered on Amazon as we were having a snowstorm. I will continue to buy this item at PetSmart, where the cubes are soft and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: kip213

customer_reviews.title: Makes mealtime a joy!
customer_reviews.text: Oliver is almost ten years old and has always been a fussy eater...not anymore! He LOVES Instinct and comes running when he hears the bag crinkle. He knows that he will get one whole nugget while I break up 5 or 6 to mix into his Science Diet canned stew. Oliver happily gobbles his meal down. Is Instinct a bit pricey? Yes, but now I’m not wasting money by throwing out uneaten food...a savings in the long run and a happy, healthier fifteen-pound bundle of love!!
customer_reviews.author: Hermine I. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great topper or treat
customer_reviews.text: I add these to my dogs bowl when they seem to be bored with the usual dinner. I also trick them occasionally and give them out as treats. They don't know the difference so I have to believe that they are super tasty. I like the ingredients and I like that the bag is resealable. These are tiny pellets, white in color and have no discernable smell. The bag holds quite a few because they're tiny but pack a lot of flavor, if you believe my dogs. They break up quite easily, with very little pressure so even my toothless dog can eat them. If these were cheaper I would buy them as treats.
customer_reviews.author: The Nutbarn Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy add-on to your dog food to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy add-on to your dog food to make it a little more fun. Just be careful for smaller dogs and their protein intake as it can cause loose stools that make his / her tummy hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Candlelady

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get my dog to eat dry food for his whole life (8 years) because it is better for his teeth. I smash up 2-3 in his food as a powder and he inhales his food!!! These are a little pricey but my dog loves them and he’s also small so I only use 2-3 a day. If you have a big dog this might not be a great option. Great product and great variety! Yeah
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Fixer-upper with bored dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog looooooved this! But he got a little clever and would eat just the mixer and leave the kibble untouched. So what I did was smash it until it was powder and mix it with his kibble. TA-DA! It worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Zuley Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Super Fussy Malamute Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: One of my Malamutes goes through an anorexic phase every spring where getting her to eat anything for a few weeks is a serious challenge. Just got these, and she loves them!! Definitely ordering the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: herbivorehippie

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES These!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several different raw toppers and liked that this had minimal ingredients. I try to buy foods that don't have a lot of extra added ingredients, sugars, or salts. This mix fits the bill and my pup goes crazy it. I feed him less than what the bag indicates and have been able to extend the usage of this bag. Otherwise, it's a little small. I break up the pieces to sprinkle them throughout his food so he doesn't just pick out the topper. A good way to give a raw boost to the diet without going fully raw.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: ... three of my dogs and my four cats all love these treats
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dogs and my four cats all love these treats. The dogs will eat anything, but the cats are very picky! My dogs go crazy over these, and I know they are a healthy and delicious treat for them. Overall, they are a great purchase and I intend to keep buying them for my pets. They are a bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure these could be any more awesome! We use them as treats, or crumble them up over my incredibly picky dog's food, which he then gobbles up. One bag lasts us for weeks. We probably use 10 a day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pen

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkies like it
customer_reviews.text: I crumble a couple of pieces of this to kind of coat my picky dogs’ dry food with it - they’re more willing to eat the dry food with this and since I use so little my first package lasted months. This is my second purchase, since the dogs and I are both happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Picky Eaters
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been very picky with eating his food lately so I gave this a try since he loves liver treats. Like some reviews I read they say to crush it with kibble which I did. I also mixed it and it coated the kibble nicely. My fury baby absolutely loved it. He gobbled all his food up and wanted more. Great topper for picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: maralv12

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dog this every day! Around a quarter of a cup a day. Once in the morning with his regular dog food. This is the first thing he eats. He is a picky eater too. Works great to help him eat his other food too. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them! I wanted something healthier to us so I got these to use with his interactive toys. He is not a picky eater so I can not comment on that. Not sure how long a bad will last, I just got it and only use a small handful at a time.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: My dog inhales this!
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my dog both as a treat as well as crush it up over his dog food. He will inhales these and they’re natural, so while expensive, I will be purchasing them again. Highly recommend, even if your dog is picky, they will love them!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Okay topper
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (both old guys) like these toppers, but the price is outrageous for the amount you get. Reading the ingredients they look to be very healthy, but they do stink! Unless you are only putting 3-4 pieces on top of the food, the bag will only last about 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: J Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for treats...
customer_reviews.text: My dog lives these as a little treat. I just break them into pieces and give. Not the cheapest but a bag used like this last of good few months at the least. I don’t give but maybe 1-2 times week.
customer_reviews.author: Pookums65

customer_reviews.title: He always ate these first too before his food so they've got to taste good because he absolutely loves his food too
customer_reviews.text: We used these to help supplement our pups calories while we were backcountry backpacking. He maintained his weight and seemed to fill up every night so Id say they are a success! He always ate these first too before his food so they've got to taste good because he absolutely loves his food too!! cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: great product; dog loves them; happy house.
customer_reviews.text: we have a German Sheppard / Terrier mix who is quite the smartie pants... she was getting bored with her kibble; instead of wasting was was left in the large bag I bought, I got these to just top it during meal time and she goes insane, totally loves them and eats the rest of her kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Spillderbrains

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these, happy dance time!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is crazy about these. Had to switch him to a limited ingredients diet, he was not enjoying at all. Now when I say, "sprinkle's", he does the happy dance and gobbles his food up.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Poki says Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. When I ran out she actually refused to eat until she realized I really didn’t have any left! I can’t mix it in with her food though because she will flip all her food out of her bowl to get to these pieces first.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Walton

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My shiba inu is really picky but these have helped improve her appetite. It is gentle on her stomach and does not smell weird.
customer_reviews.author: Senpaitiff

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, seriously ridiculously priced. $30 for a pound? Come on!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Yates

customer_reviews.title: My Lab loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves these.... And actually my cat clamors for them too...will have to get freeze dried for kitties. I was worried it would really upset my dogs tummy but gave her small amounts to start so no major issues.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great food, dogs LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Doggy crack, beware your dogs will LOVE this stuff. My min-pin has very delicate tummy and he does better on this than any other soft food. This is not soft like wet food but easy for small breeds to chew
customer_reviews.author: WI shopper

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog vomit
customer_reviews.text: I broke one the mixers down and mixed it in with my dog's food. He vomited after 10 minutes which was unusual. I'm back to using stella's meal mixers which are slightly more expensive but better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Farik

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this because they do not put enough meat in the dog food bags, but he loves this and my Shi Tzu is a very picky eater
customer_reviews.author: K. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this on top of her meal! She is spoiled. She is about 13 lbs and one bag has lasted months.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Not well received by my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Still can’t find the ideal dog food for my finicky dog with a weak gut. Disappointed this turned out to be the wrong choice for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Orlin

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and always needs something in her food to eat it (primarily because we have to put one of her pill medications in her food) but once we put these toppers on her food she doesnt even notice the pill and doesnt hesitate eating her whole bowl of food.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually cheaper in the store. The smaller size not a bad price but the larger one is a bit more. Maybe for convenience this is OK for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cathlene Young

customer_reviews.title: Amazing treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They can't wait for me to get them out of the treat jar.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Just give this a try, each dog is different
customer_reviews.text: My dogs were ok with these but not crazy about them. It may just b that it was something new, I had to switch back to the old kind I was using
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: My dogs give these 4 paws up.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE Raw Boost Mixers as “topping” for their meals. Great as they come and they are also able to be crumbled by hand to sprinkle on top of food.
customer_reviews.author: momof2greatcats

customer_reviews.title: well bought it for dog
customer_reviews.text: seems to help a little but dog just picked out what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Great as treats and for training.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to carry for training purposes. They do not have a strong scent nor are they greasy. My dog loves the diffrrrng varieties. I use them as treats and for training and not good toppers.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Great food topper
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the taste of this raw boost. I add to their kibble and they gobble it up
customer_reviews.author: T. Valles

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative than expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these! Wanted to try something different than other high end brands and he eats these up just as quick!
customer_reviews.author: kms955

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my pups food and also a great little treat on their own. I’m happy with the ingredients and the fact that it’s freeze dried.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My older pups, Malteses hardly have any teeth left and they were picky to begin with- I finally found a treat that they will jump out of bed for!
customer_reviews.author: Holistic Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Dachshund approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dachshunds love this! It makes them gobble up their food and makes a nice “gravy” with some warm water. I only use between 6-10 pieces per dog. I’m sticking with this!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: my dogs LOVE LOVE LOVE these little bits and so does my ...
customer_reviews.text: my dogs LOVE LOVE LOVE these little bits and so does my vet !!! well worth ordering and adding to your dogs diet ,especially if your dog has to eat a limited diet ,avoiding grains like one of our dogs does .....
customer_reviews.author: Rose  Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described and did encourage my dog to eat more, but for the money it is a very small package and goes pretty quick if you have a bigger dog
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ciamarichello

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Dogs liked it but prefer the tru dog I believe tru dog is healthier
customer_reviews.author: Rita Dropski

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this as topper to her meal
customer_reviews.text: I only give her a few at a time so lasted me for about a month. I like that it's made in the USA so trust the material used. At $11.99 I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great treats and they dont crumble easily
customer_reviews.text: I use these for dog treats. I cut them in half using scissors for training, and the amount of crumble is minimum. They are perfect for training, not messy or smelly, and my dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: The dogs like it. So why the low rating? The dogs will eat only the topper and leave the rest of the food. Also the price per serving is high.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for trainer treats! Healthy treats for your pup
customer_reviews.text: My 5mo boxer puppy loves these! You can it add to their food but I use them for treats. This is the 3rd one I bought in this flavor. Tyson says thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater pup
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and she loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: This is like doggie crack. I use as training treats works great

customer_reviews.title: Doggie style
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this a lot and now he eats his meals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My pup is quite picky and gets distracted from eating if it’s not something she really likes. Fortunately these do the trick. I usually crumble one up and mix the crumbs into her food—that way it holds her interest all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Dariya

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Was really hopeful these would do the trick for my picky dog. However she wont even eat them as a tread let alone in her food!

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective.
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not like it. She's very picky, and this didn't change that.

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eater

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Instead buy canned low sodium chicken and flake pieces over and into food. Healthier, cheaper, dog loves it.

customer_reviews.title: good topper

customer_reviews.title: Great for training!
customer_reviews.text: Great treat for training. Put a few on top of their meal.

customer_reviews.title: Instinct makes a great freeze dried food.
customer_reviews.text: Whether it be an entire meal, or just the topper... Instinct has a wonderful job. Both my dogs and my cat love these and we sometimes use them as a treat. Love.

customer_reviews.title: Dog prefers over jerky

customer_reviews.title: Great food topper for my dog!

customer_reviews.text: In addition to this dogfood I add a little (spoonful) of dog food (meat) for flavor and also some water.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever absolutely loves when we crush and sprinkle these on his food.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs liked everything except freeze dried veggies

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly like I buy from the pet store. My dogs love it.

customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Our dog trainer refers to it as "puppy crack" Dogs go crazy over this and it's a great training tool. Easy to handle and no smells.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this bag

customer_reviews.text: I use these as training treats. My dog loves them. Of course, he is a lab. They love almost all food.

I crumble a few pieces on her food so that it mixes in the food and she has to eat the rest of her food in order to get to the "doggie crack". She actually won't eat unless the mixer is on her food.

product_meta.title: Instinct Freeze Dried Raw Boost Mixers Grain Free Recipe All Natural Dog Food Toppers
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Beef| Size:6 oz. BagTop your kibble with raw – all natural nutrition made from pure animal protein, fruits, vegetables and other whole food ingredients! Instinct Raw Boost Mixers are made with 100% freeze dried raw. Our raw dog food toppers are natural, made from real meat and whole food ingredients, protein packed and minimally processed. Instinct Raw Boost Mixers are grain free dry dog food toppers made with responsibly sourced protein and non-GMO vegetables and fruits. Always made without grain, potato, corn, wheat, soy, artificial colors or preservatives. Instinct's raw, whole food ingredients are freeze dried to gently remove moisture, locking in nutrients and intensifying flavor. Use Instinct natural dog food toppers to add variety and excitement to every meal or as dog food treats for training - either way, Instinct raw dog food mixers are perfect for picky dogs and puppies. Available in a variety of raw freeze dried dog food topper recipes: All Natural Beef, Cage Free Chicken, Grass Fed Lamb, Cage Free Turkey. Made in the USA with the finest ingredients from around the world. Satisfaction guaranteed. Questions? Call Instinct at 888-519-7387.
feature_bullets: FREEZE DRIED RAW DOG FOOD TOPPER WITH ALL NATURAL BEEF: Add raw to your dog bowl with Instinct Raw Boost Mixers all natural, grain free dog food toppers. Made with responsibly sourced all natural beef, beef organs and non-GMO vegetables and fruits.

GRAIN FREE DOG FOOD MIXER: Raw, whole food ingredients are freeze dried to gently remove moisture, locking in nutrients and intesifying flavor. Made without grain, potato, corn, wheat, soy, by product meal, artificial colors or preservatives.

DRY DOG FOOD TOPPER OR DOG TREAT: Add variety and excitement to dry dog food with Raw Boost Mixers. Made with all natural ingredients to support healthy digestion and skin & coat. The perfect natural dog food topper or dog treats for picky dogs & puppies.

POWER OF RAW INGREDIENTS: Our dog food is made with the pure, real nutrition of raw. Raw is natural, made from real meat & whole food ingredients, protein packed & minimally processed. Made in the USA with the finest ingredients from around the world.
OUR BEST DOG FOOD TOPPER: We craft dry & wet dog food from real ingredients

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
